description: “Where are you from?” I asked trying to get Gus to open up a little bit. “From the Midwest. I am a farm boy…country raised.” He said with a sexy accent. “Are we talking like hay bales and cow farms?” I jokingly asked. “You got that right. I like getting my hands dirty!” From the second I saw Gus I couldn’t help but to think he looks like he could be related to Stu. They both had that same charming smile and adorable boy next-door charm to them. We brought him out to the park for a bit to hit some balls and show off. While he was swinging the bat and knocking out home runs, I couldn’t keep my eyes off his package. “I can see your dick through those shorts!” “Its not even hard yet, you should see how big it is when I get turned on and horny!” Gus says he’s straight but during the day he would tease us and drop hints about maybe coming back for some action. “Do you think you would come back?” He smiled a bit. “You’ll just have to wait and see!” After seeing the huge load he shot during the film, I sure do hope we see Gus again.
title: Gus
